episodes.title: The Finders Part 2
episodes.description:
Grab a beer and join us tonight as we wrap up our series on The Finders! In part two, we'll get into the group's founder - Marion Pettie. We'll cover what we know of his background, and how the cult operated. Then we'll go over all the CIA involvement, and try to figure out what The Finders were/are.

episodes.title: The Finders Part 1
episodes.description:
Grab a beer and join us tonight as we go down the rabbit hole, and start our series on The Finders! We'll start with the bizarre 1987 arrest two men in Tallahassee, FL, and follow that thread to a warehouse filed with sensitive documents, photos, etc.

episodes.title: Tony Ortega On Scientology and Paulette Cooper
episodes.description: Grab a beer and join us tonight for our interview with Tony Ortega! Tony is well known for his daily blog about the Church of Scientology called The Underground Bunker. Previously he was executive editor of The Raw Story, a journalist at the New Times LA, the editor-in-chief of the Broward-Palm Beach New Times, and the editor-in-chief of The Village Voice. He has been seen on documentaries like HBO’s Going Clear, and Leah Remini’s Scientology and the Aftermath on A&E. In 2015 he authored The Unbreakable Miss Lovely: How the Church of Scientology tried to destroy Paulette Cooper, about journalist Paulette Cooper and the Church of Scientology's attempts to silence her after her own book was published.
